name: Adventure Tales
description:
Adventure Tales is an one tap game,

Still undeveloped but I would like to show what is the gameplay. 

Storyline: You stuck in Slime forest in endless run? Or you just dreaming? Find your way out. 

Features: 

Change Class: Warrior, Mage , Ninja

Different types of slime have different ability 

Coming soon:

Story mode, Pet, Aura, Wings
